description: This hike is an ascent to two peaks in the Kokanee Glacier Park , from the lodge which is a very nice lodge great facilities , electric , showers , cooking stations . Bunk bed sleeping. Very reasonable fee per night.
directions: From Nelson BC  drive north on Hwy 3A till you get to KOKANEE CREEK PARK on Kootenay Lake turn at   Lat  49.611417° Long -117.116159°  up Kokanee Glacier Road  drive to parking area at Lat  49.722994° , Long -117.152848° Gibson Lake. It is then a 3 hr. hike to the lodge  and is spectacular by its self. Good trail standard park trail.
title: Mount Giegerich  Mount Nansen
